TextView.android:text: SUPPORT SUPERVISION CHECKLIST FOR PHARMACIES HUMAN AND VETERINARY)
Is there a valid Certificate of Practice for the Pharmacist?
Does the Pharmacy have a valid license from NDA?
Are both documents prominently displayed on the Premises?
Are the Pharmacy auxiliary staff trained by PSU?
Is the code of ethics prominently displayed?
Is there evidence of the Pharmacist being Present at the stipulated times?
Are there records for attendance times for the technical staff?
Are written job descriptions/appointment letters available for all staff?
Do the staff in the Pharmacy have identification tags with their titles?
Does the Pharmacy have an organization structure with clear reporting mechanisms?
